name: The Mole
blurb: A swingin' good 2D adventure that you're sure to "dig". The Mole strives to achieve the feel of those long forgotten platformers.

rewards.reward: Email List\r\n- Your email will be added to a special list dedicated to my backers, that I will regularly use to report updates on the development of The Mole.
The Game (Early Bird) - You get the game, just like the $15 tier, but for $5 cheaper for donating early! I'll also add you to the backer email list from the $5 tier.
The Game\r\n- You will receive a digital voucher which can be used to download your own copy of The Mole once it's been completed.\r\n- You will also be added to the $5 tier email list at no charge!

The Game: Special Edition + Super Secret Email List\r\n- You will receive a digital voucher which can be used to download your own special edition copy of The Mole only available through this Kickstarter (see reward descriptions for more info), and your email will be added to a separate list of extra generous backers that I will use to provide behind the scenes looks into my development process!\r\n- You will additionally be added to the $5 tier email list.
First Round of Bonus and Arena Levels (Early Bird) - You get everything from the $50 tier but for $10 off for being an early backer!

First Round of Bonus and Arena Levels\r\n- You will receive the special edition of the game and a digital voucher redeemable for the first round of bonus levels and multiplayer arenas (see reward descriptions to the left and below for more info).\r\n- Also your email will be added to both lists mentioned above free of charge!

Poster and Exclusive PDF
- You will receive one physical poster measuring 26.5" x 19.5", designed as a piece of fan art for the entire Animalia series!
- In addition you will receive a downloadable PDF packed with concept art, the design document for The Mole, some designer commentary on the Animalia series, as well as some tips and cheats for playing the game.
- Also you will receive the vouchers mentioned above for the special edition of the game, the first round of bonus levels, and the arenas, in addition to being added to both email lists. What a value!

T-Shirt and Google Hangout Invite
- You'll receive one awesome t-shirt featuring the mole as well as the poster mentioned above delivered directly to you.
- In addition I will invite you to a google hangout where you can watch and chat with me and a small group of other backers as I script, design, and develop The Mole.
- Also you will get one download each of the exclusive PDF, the special edition of the game, and the bonus levels and arenas, in addition to being added to both email lists.

Design an Arena\r\n- At this level, I want you to come up with the coolest multiplayer arena that you can imagine, then I'll make it a reality. I'll get in touch and we'll layout whatever sort of arena you want to show off to your friends and the world! You think it, and I'll code it.\r\n- This level also gets you the t-shirt, poster, google hangout invite, PDF, special edition game, the bonus levels and arenas, as well as being added to the email lists.

Design a Bonus Level\r\n- If you are this generous, then I want to make a full bonus level for The Mole just how you want it. I'll get in touch and we'll work out the wildest, craziest, zaniest level you can imagine into a full fledged level! If you've always dreamed of doing some game design this is the tier for you. You dream it and I'll code it.\r\n- You'll also receive the t-shirt, poster, google hangout invite, PDF, special edition game, the bonus levels and arenas, and you'll be added to both email lists. Arguably the best deal of all!
